text.__SUMMARY__: Cryptanthus acaulis is a plant species in the genus Cryptanthus. This species is endemic to Brazil.
text.Cultivars:
Cryptanthus 'Bivittato-Acaulis'
Cryptanthus 'Cabo Frio Cabbage'
Cryptanthus 'Cochleatus'
Cryptanthus 'Grace'
Cryptanthus 'Makoyanus'
Cryptanthus 'Mary Jo'
Cryptanthus 'Variegata'
Cryptanthus 'Whirligig'
× Neotanthus 'Ted Will'
